definitions.definition: The reestablishment of friendly relations; conciliation or rapprochement.
definitions.example: He longed for reconciliation with his estranged father, but too many painful memories kept him from making contact again.

definitions.definition: The end of estrangement between a human and God as a result of the process of atonement.
A Roman Catholic sacrament involving contrition, confession, punishment and absolution; penance.
Process of matching, comparing and agreeing figures from accounting records against those presented on a bank statement, including list of explainable differences.
